stev.kwikemart

Class PaperRoll

  • java.lang.Object
    • stev.kwikemart.PaperRoll

  • public final class PaperRoll
extends java.lang.Object
    A roll of paper to be placed in the register. The register must have a non-empty paper roll in order to print a receipt.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PaperRoll LARGE_ROLL
      An instance of a large paper roll (1000 lines)
      static PaperRoll SMALL_ROLL
      An instance of a small paper roll (25 lines)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object clone() 
      int getLinesLeft()
      Gets the number of lines left to print in the roll.
      void println(java.lang.String s)
      Prints a string to the paper.
      java.lang.String tearUp()
      Outputs the contents of the paper roll since the last call to tearUp().

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • SMALL_ROLL

        public static final PaperRoll SMALL_ROLL
        An instance of a small paper roll (25 lines)

      • LARGE_ROLL

        public static final PaperRoll LARGE_ROLL
        An instance of a large paper roll (1000 lines)

    • Method Detail

      • tearUp

        public final java.lang.String tearUp()
        Outputs the contents of the paper roll since the last call to tearUp(). This is equivalent to "tearing up" a piece of the roll.
        Returns:
        The contents of the paper roll

      • getLinesLeft

        public final int getLinesLeft()
        Gets the number of lines left to print in the roll.
        Returns:
        The number of lines. A value of zero means that the roll won't accept any further call to its println() method.

      • println

        public final void println(java.lang.String s)
                   throws PaperRollException.OutOfPaperException
        Prints a string to the paper. Each line printed decrements the number of lines left in the paper roll before it runs out of paper.
        Parameters:
        s - The string. If s contains multiple lines, they are first split and each line is printed separately.
        Throws:
        PaperRollException.OutOfPaperException - Thrown if no more paper is available to print a line. Any remaining lines to print are discarded.

      • clone

        public final java.lang.Object clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
